author: perezhilton
title: Luke Bryan Performs A Solid National Anthem At Super Bowl LI! Watch His Performance HERE! | PerezHilton.com
text:
#NFLpremium 
L'inno nazionale americano cantato da #LukeBryan al #NGRStadium di #Houston per il 51° #SuperBowl ! #PatriotsVSFalcons pic.twitter.com/7H2nDVFdNI 
— PremiumSportHD (@PremiumSportHD) February 5, 2017 

We were really looking forward to Luke Bryan 's rendition of The Star Spangled Banner …
And he nailed it!
The country superstar had all eyes on him as he belted out the National Anthem in his strong baritone during Super Bowl LI , prior to the New England Patriots and Atlanta Falcons hitting the field.
Check out his performance (above)! 
Tags: luke bryan , national anthem , super bowl , super bowl 51
